Posts.Content: I love running and was running 3-4 times a week  pre diagnosis since op and starting chemo I've not managed out at all ...!!!  I use the M&S zip up bra which I find the best. Hope your not to sore and find one that suits you best. I can't wait to get back out with my running girls and build my mileage up again. Rachel
Posts.Title: Anyone enjoy running post mastectomy?!
